entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Make dotnet list package --vulnerable take the target framework into account #24193
  • Workload not found: android-aot installing macos workload #24441

Updated

  • Mark the SDK in VS previews as preview in the installer UI #24534
    Backlog
  • Scheme for UrlAttribute #24991
  • Most dotnet commands fail with WorkloadManifestCompositionException after installing VSPreview #24854
  • Improve performance of workload installation #24843
  • .NET 6.0 upgrade gives System.TypeLoadException Could not load type 'System.IO.File' from assembly System.Runtime Version=6.0.0.0 #24835
  • Strange fallback RIDs #23390
  • Unused Private and Public methods are difficult to discover #24911
  • `SkipLocalsInit` property to make the SDK generate `[module: SkipLocalsInit]` #24894
  • Workloads: Better handling of package signature failures during install #24887
  • Error Installing dotnet-sdk on Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS #24877
  • Default ImplicitUsings for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web create ambiguity when referencing IHostingEnvironment #25121
  • Add command to print the RID of the .NET SDK. #25065
  • Possible build time regression on empty macOS (Arm64) projects #25037
  • Arm install wasm-tools ? Workload ID wasm-tools isn't supported on this platform #25031
  • CoreCLR failed to build with error NETSDK1182 with MSVC on windows amd64. #25005
  • dotnet publish -graph fails while dotnet build -graph works #24414
    Backlog
  • Cannot run Microsoft.Web.LibraryManager.Cli tool with .NET 6/7 SDK's #24648
  • Package validation Baseline Package Validator should optionally check semantic versioning rules #24781
  • Add MsDeploySkipRule support for web package deployment #12477
  • PackageValidation with --no-build when project has ProjectReference causes NETSDK1085 #24943
    7.0.1xx
  • [macOS] dotnet publish cannot write pkg file #24348

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back build retry #25141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25130
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25129
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force rebuilding R2R images if project files have been changed #25126
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25116
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for native lib #25060
    Area-ILLink
